Desc.eng: You must be Van Helsing! You fame precedes you, sir. My name is Todor Schimko and I used to work for the scientists of the Phlogiston Society.
Hopefully the madness was not catching. What is this place, anyway?
An abandoned research facility. When I had to flee my mentors, I found refuge here. I also brought some important documents with me. Take a look.
The blueprints for an Improved Generator by Heinrich von Sturm? I’ll take it. (Generator Plan)
Professor Fulmigati’s research paper on a mechanical trap? How much? (Trap Plan)
I see some notes by Dr. Blawatzky on human mind and body. What do you want for them? (+5 ability points)
I’m not asking much. I’d like to get into your secret headquarters before I die out here. If you accept me, the document is yours.
